mapper.sql: SELECT gs.id, gs.product_id, gs.sc_id, gs.stock_num, gs.tax_price, gs.tax_amount FROM tbl_product_stock AS gs INNER JOIN base_data_product AS g ON g.id = gs.product_id AND g.product_type = 1 LEFT JOIN base_data_product_brand AS b ON b.id = g.brand_id LEFT JOIN base_data_product_category AS c ON c.id = g.category_id
